Name: Heartbeat
Description: Records logged by Log Analytics agents once per minute to report on agent health.

Properties.Name: TenantId
Properties.Description: ID of the workspace that stores this record.

Properties.Name: SourceSystem
Properties.Description: Type of agent the data was collected from. Possible values are OpsManager (Windows agent) or Linux.

Properties.Name: TimeGenerated
Properties.Description: Date and time the record was created.

Properties.Name: MG
Properties.Description: Id of the management group for System Center Operations Manager agents.

Properties.Name: ManagementGroupName
Properties.Description: Name of Operations Manager management group.

Properties.Name: SourceComputerId
Properties.Description: Unique ID of computer.

Properties.Name: ComputerIP
Properties.Description: IP address of the computer. Note that public IP is used

Properties.Name: Computer
Properties.Description: Computer name

Properties.Name: Category
Properties.Description: Value is Direct Agent SCOM Agent or SCOM Management Server.

Properties.Name: OSType
Properties.Description: Type of OS. Possible values are Windows or Linux .

Properties.Name: OSName
Properties.Description: Name of OS.

Properties.Name: OSMajorVersion
Properties.Description: Operating system major version.

Properties.Name: OSMinorVersion
Properties.Description: Operating system minor version.

Properties.Name: Version
Properties.Description: Version of the agent.

Properties.Name: SCAgentChannel
Properties.Description: Specfies how agent is connected to workspace. Possible values are Direct or SCManagementServer.

Properties.Name: IsGatewayInstalled
Properties.Description: If Log Analytics gateway is installed value is true otherwise value is false.

Properties.Name: RemoteIPLongitude
Properties.Description: Longitude of computer's geographic location.

Properties.Name: RemoteIPLatitude
Properties.Description: Latitude of computer's geographic location.

Properties.Name: RemoteIPCountry
Properties.Description: Geographic location where computer is deployed.

Properties.Name: SubscriptionId
Properties.Description: Subscription ID of the Azure resource running the agent

Properties.Name: ResourceGroup
Properties.Description: Resource name of the Azure resource running the agent.

Properties.Name: ResourceProvider
Properties.Description: Resource provider of the Azure resource running the agent

Properties.Name: Resource
Properties.Description: Resource group name of the Azure resource running the agent.

Properties.Name: ResourceId
Properties.Description: Resource ID of the Azure resource running the agent. Retained for for backward compatibility. _ResourceId should be used.

Properties.Name: ResourceType
Properties.Description: Type of the Azure resource running the agent. Examples include virtualmachines or managedclusters.

Properties.Name: ComputerEnvironment
Properties.Description: Environment that hosts the computer: Azure or Non-Azure

Properties.Name: Solutions
Properties.Description: List of solutions deployed on the agent at the moment when Heartbeat was issued.
